df-cms
blocks.content: Define the class of complete metric spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-bn
blocks.content: Define the class of all Banach spaces. A Banach space is a normed vector space such that both the vector space and the scalar field are complete under their respective norm-induced metrics. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-hl
blocks.content: Define the class of all subcomplex Hilbert spaces. A subcomplex Hilbert space is a Banach space which is also an inner product space over a subfield of the field of complex numbers closed under square roots of nonnegative reals. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: isbn
blocks.content: A Banach space is a normed vector space with a complete induced metric. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isbn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cnvc, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cnvc, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms)))
  elin(c0, cnvc, ccms)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cbn, cin(cnvc, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), ccms))
  eleq1d(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), ccms, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(csca, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csca)
  df-bn(hs0)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cnvc, ccms))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, ccms))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isbn(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ban ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà NrmVec ‚àß c0 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ‚àà Ban, (c0 ‚àà NrmVec ‚àß c0 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp), (c0 ‚àà(NrmVec ‚ãÇ CMetSp)‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp), ((c0 ‚àà NrmVec ‚àß c0 ‚àà CMetSp)‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp))
  anbi1i(c0 ‚àà(NrmVec ‚ãÇ CMetSp), c1 ‚àà CMetSp, (c0 ‚àà NrmVec ‚àß c0 ‚àà CMetSp))
  elin(c0, cnvc, ccms)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cbn, (NrmVec ‚ãÇ CMetSp), c1 ‚àà CMetSp, (Scalar ` hs0)‚àà CMetSp)
  eleq1d((Scalar ` hs0), ccms, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Scalar ` hs0), c1, (Scalar ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, csca)
  df-bn(hs0)
  df-3an(c0 ‚àà NrmVec, c0 ‚àà CMetSp, c1 ‚àà CMetSp)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((NrmVec ‚ãÇ CMetSp))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà CMetSp)
}

blocks.name: iscms
blocks.content: A complete metric space is a metric space with a complete metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccms, cms, wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)), wsbc(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcied(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  fvexd(cbs, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq12d(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1)), c1, cfv(ccmet, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  reseq12d(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cfv(cds, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(ccmet, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-cms(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cms)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMetSp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà MetSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(CMet ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccms, cms, c1 ‚àà(CMet ` c2), [(Base ` hs0)/ hs1]((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 √ó hs1))‚àà(CMet ` hs1))
  sbcied(hs1, (Base ` hs0), universe, hs0 = c0, ((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 √ó hs1))‚àà(CMet ` hs1), c1 ‚àà(CMet ` c2))
  fvexd(cbs, hs0, hs0 = c0)
  eleq12d(((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 √ó hs1)), (CMet ` hs1), c1, (CMet ` c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  syl6eqr(((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 √ó hs1)), c1, ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  reseq12d((dist ` hs0), (hs1 √ó hs1), (dist ` c0), (c2 √ó c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs0), (dist ` hs0)=(dist ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd(hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  fveq2d(ccmet, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  sylan9eqr(hs1, c2, (Base ` hs0), hs0 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  id(hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-cms(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cms)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà(CMet ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ‚àà(CMet ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: cmspropd
blocks.content: Property deduction for a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c1, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1))))
  mspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eleq12d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  fveq2d(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  iscms(c0, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  iscms(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà CMetSp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà CMetSp))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2))=((dist ` c1)|`(c2 √ó c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ‚àà CMetSp, c1 ‚àà CMetSp, (c0 ‚àà MetSp ‚àß((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))‚àà(CMet `(Base ` c0))), (c1 ‚àà MetSp ‚àß((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)))‚àà(CMet `(Base ` c1))))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ‚àà MetSp, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))‚àà(CMet `(Base ` c0)), c1 ‚àà MetSp, ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)))‚àà(CMet `(Base ` c1)))
  mspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eleq12d(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), (CMet `(Base ` c0)), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1))), (CMet `(Base ` c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1))), ((dist ` c1)|`(c2 √ó c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c1)|`(c2 √ó c2)), ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c0), (c2 √ó c2), ((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, (Base ` c0), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c1), (c2 √ó c2), ((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, (Base ` c1), w0)
  fveq2d(ccmet, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  iscms(c0, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))))
  iscms(c1, ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1))), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid(((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1))))
}

blocks.name: cmssmscld
blocks.content: The restriction of a metric space is closed if it is complete. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmssmscld(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c1, cfv(ccld, c4), cfv(ccld, cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cmet, c2)))
  msmet(c0, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c2)
  eqeltrd(cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1), cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)))
  eqtrd(cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c1, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)))
  resabs1d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  anidms(wss(c1, c2), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  xpss12(c1, c2, c1, c2)
  reseq1d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c1, c1), cfv(cds, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c3)), wcel(c1, universe))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylbi(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sseq2i(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  ssex(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  ressds(c1, universe, cfv(cds, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  imp(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  syl5bi(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3)))))
  iscms(c3, cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(cbs, c3))

  biimpd(wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cms)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))

  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3)), cxp(c1, c1), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cms)))

  fveq2d(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3), c1, wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cms)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cbs, c3), c1, wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cms)))

blocks.content: The restriction of a complete metric space is complete iff it is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

thm cmsss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))))

  adantr(wcel(c0, ccms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  cmscmet(c0, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c2)

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c4, cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(c0, cms))

blocks.name: lssbn
blocks.content: A subspace of a Banach space is a Banach space iff it is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(c3, ccms))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccms)), wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  bnnvc(c0)
  lssnvc(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(csca, c3), ccms, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  resssca(c1, c2, cfv(csca, c0), c3, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
  bnsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  baib(wa(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccms))
  bitri(wcel(c3, cbn), wa(wa(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)), wcel(c3, ccms)), w3a(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)))
  isbn(c3, cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c3))
  3anan32(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))), wcel(c0, ccms), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))

}

  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c0, ccms)), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, cms))

blocks.name: ishl
blocks.content: The predicate "is a subcomplex Hilbert space." A Hilbert space is a Banach space which is also an inner product space, i.e. whose norm satisfies the parallelogram law. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlbn
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a Banach space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: hlcph
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlphl
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is an inner product space (also called a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlcms
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlprlem

blocks.origin:

  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c2, ccms), wcel(c0, cbn))

blocks.name: hlress
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex Hilbert space contains ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlpr
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex Hilbert space is either ` RR ` or ` CC ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cphssphl
blocks.content: A Banach subspace of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: cmslssbn
blocks.content: A complete linear subspace of a normed vector space is a Banach space. We furthermore have to assume that the field of scalars is complete since this is a requirement in the current definition of Banach spaces ~ df-bn . (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmslssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c1, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cnvc))
  lssnvc(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  impancom(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  eleq1d(cfv(csca, c0), ccms, cfv(csca, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))))
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c1)))
  resssca(c2, c3, cfv(csca, c0), c1, c0)

  eqid(cfv(csca, c1))
}

blocks.name: cmscsscms
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a complete metric space which is also a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a complete metric space. Remark: the assumption that the Banach space must be a (subcomplex) pre-Hilbert space is required because the definition of ` ClSubSp ` is based on an inner product. If ` ClSubSp ` was generalized to arbitrary topological spaces (or at least topological modules), this assumption could be omitted. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: bncssbn
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a Banach space which is also a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a Banach space. Remark: the assumption that the Banach space must be a (subcomplex) pre-Hilbert space is required because the definition of ` ClSubSp ` is based on an inner product. If ` ClSubSp ` was generalized for arbitrary topological spaces, this assuption could be omitted. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)

  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)))

  bncms(c0)
  cmscsscms(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(c0, cphl))

blocks.name: cssbn
blocks.content: A complete subspace of a normed vector space with a complete scalar field is a Banach space. Remark: In contrast to ` ClSubSp ` , a complete subspace is defined by "a linear subspace in which all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the subspace". This is closer to the original, but deprecated definition ` CH ` ( ~ df-ch ) of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space. It may be superseded by ~ cmslssbn . (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: csschl
blocks.content: A complete subspace of a complex pre-Hilbert space is a complex Hilbert space. Remarks: (a) In contrast to ` ClSubSp ` , a complete subspace is defined by "a linear subspace in which all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the subspace". This is closer to the original, but deprecated definition ` CH ` ( ~ df-ch ) of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space. (b) This theorem does not hold for arbitrary subcomplex (pre-)Hilbert spaces, because the scalar field as restriction of the field of the complex numbers need not be closed. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm csschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wa(wcel(c4, chl), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld)
} = {
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(c4, chl), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wcel(c4, chl), wcel(c4, cbn))
  syl31anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(c4, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  cphnvc(c0)
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(ccnfld, ccms))
  cncms()
  eleq1(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld, ccms)
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  cssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  cphssphl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld))
  syl5reqr(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld, cfv(csca, c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  resssca(c1, c2, cfv(csca, c0), c4, c0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
}

thm csschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))‚Üí(c4 ‚àà CHil ‚àß(Scalar ` c4)= CCfld))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =((dist ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1))
  ‚ä£ (Scalar ` c0)= CCfld
} = {
  jca((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ‚àà CHil, (Scalar ` c4)= CCfld)
  syld3an3(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c4 ‚àà CHil, c4 ‚àà Ban)
  syl31anc((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ‚àà Ban, c0 ‚àà NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c0 ‚àà NrmVec)
  cphnvc(c0)
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp, (Scalar ` c0)= CCfld)
  mpbiri((Scalar ` c0)= CCfld, (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp, CCfld ‚àà CMetSp)
  cncms()
  eleq1((Scalar ` c0), ccnfld, ccms)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  cssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  cphssphl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (Cau ` c3)‚äÜ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), (Scalar ` c4)= CCfld)
  syl5reqr((Scalar ` c4), ccnfld, (Scalar ` c0), c1 ‚àà c2)
  resssca(c1, c2, (Scalar ` c0), c4, c0)
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
}

blocks.name: cmslsschl
blocks.content: A complete linear subspace of a subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmslsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, chl))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, chl), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c1, ccph))
  syl21anc(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cbn))
  bnnvc(c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c0, cbn))
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))
  cmslssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, ccph))
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, ccph), wcel(c0, ccph))
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsscph(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  ishl(c1)
}

thm cmslsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c1 ‚àà CHil)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà CHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c1 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà Ban, c1 ‚àà CPreHil)
  syl21anc((c0 ‚àà CHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c1 ‚àà Ban, c0 ‚àà NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp, (c1 ‚àà CMetSp ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà CMetSp, c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà NrmVec)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CHil, c0 ‚àà NrmVec, c0 ‚àà Ban)
  bnnvc(c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà CMetSp, c2 ‚àà c3, (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CHil, (Scalar ` c0)‚àà CMetSp, c0 ‚àà Ban)
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  3simpc(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà CMetSp, c2 ‚àà c3)
  cmslssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà CMetSp, c2 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà CPreHil)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CHil, c2 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà CPreHil, c0 ‚àà CPreHil)
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsscph(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  ishl(c1)
}

blocks.name: chlcsschl
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm chlcsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, chl))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, chl), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph))
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
  jca(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph))
  hlbn(c0)
  bncssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccph), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)))
  hlcph(c0)
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(c0, cphl))
  hlphl(c0)
  csslss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  cphsscph(c0, c1, cfv(clss, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
  ishl(c3)
}

thm chlcsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 ‚àà CHil)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ClSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà CHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà CHil, c3 ‚àà Ban, c3 ‚àà CPreHil)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà Ban, (c0 ‚àà Ban ‚àß c0 ‚àà CPreHil))
  jca(c0 ‚àà CHil, c0 ‚àà Ban, c0 ‚àà CPreHil)
  hlbn(c0)
  bncssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà CPreHil, c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0))
  hlcph(c0)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0), c0 ‚àà PreHil)
  hlphl(c0)
  csslss(c0, c1, c2, (LSubSp ` c0))
  cphsscph(c0, c1, (LSubSp ` c0), c3)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
  ishl(c3)
}
